                                               DatabaseConnectionException

      • addEmployee

        public void addEmployee(int id,
                        java.lang.String fname,
                        java.lang.String lname,
                        java.lang.String dob,
                        java.lang.String gender,
                        java.lang.String no,
                        java.lang.String address,
                        java.lang.String pos,
                        java.lang.String jdate,
                        java.lang.String tdate)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException,
                        DatabaseConnectionException
        Adds a new employee to the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the new employee.
        fname - The first name of the new employee.
        lname - The last name of the new employee.
        dob - The date of birth of the new employee.
        gender - The gender of the new employee.
        no - The phone number of the new employee.
        address - The address of the new employee.
        pos - The position of the new employee.
        jdate - The join date of the new employee.
        tdate - The termination date of the new employee.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
        DatabaseConnectionException - If there is an issue with the database connection.

        newValue - The new value for the attribute.

                            int eid)
        Retrieves an employee by their ID from the given list.
